Sticky Bottom Navigation.Layout: Sticky bottom navigation bar with horizontally aligned links.
Sticky Bottom Navigation.Design: Compact, functional, and mobile-first. Sticky navigation stays at the bottom of the viewport as the user scrolls.

Key Elements.Navigation Links: Four equally spaced links directed towards Home, Features, Pricing, and About sections, each with an icon and label.
Key Elements.Icons: Graphical representations above each label to enhance visual guidance.
Key Elements.Transition Effects: Subtle hover and active state color transitions for interactive feedback.

Sticky Bottom Navigation.Use Cases: Ideal for mobile applications or sites prioritizing easy access to key sections. Useful for single-page websites and providing persistent navigation in long-scrolling pages.
